register.description: The control register configures the Display Controller module for the VP output. Shadow register. Note: GLBCE is not supported in this family of devices.

bitfield.description: Transparency Color Key Selection Shadow bit-field.
Transparency Color Key Enabled Shadow bit-field.
Define which layer contributes to odd/even lines of the line interleaving 3D format

bitenum.description: No interleaving happens in the overlay manager
A even pixels (for all lines) have a contribution from even z-order pipes and odd pixels (for all lines) have a contribution from the odd z-order pipes
At even lines (all pixels) have a contribution from even z-order pipes and odd lines (all pixels) have a contribution from the odd z-order pipes.

register.description: The control register configures the default solid background color bits [31:0]. Shadow register.

bitfield.description: 48-bit ARGB color value to specify the default solid color to display when there is no data from the overlays. Only [31:0] is defined in this register. Refer to DEFAULT_COLOR2 for [47:32] bits.

register.description: The control register configures the default solid background color bits [47:32]. Shadow register.

bitfield.description: 48-bit ARGB color value to specify the default solid color to display when there is no data from the overlays. Only [47:32] is defined in this register. refer to DEFAULT_COLOR for [31:0] bits

register.description: The register sets the max transparency color value for the overlays. Shadow register.

bitfield.description: [31:0] Transparency Color Key Value in 36-bit RGB format

register.description: The register sets the max transparency color value for the overlays. Shadow register.

bitfield.description: [35:32] Transparency Color Key Value in 36-bit RGB format

register.description: The register sets the min transparency color value for the overlays. Shadow register.

bitfield.description: [31:0] Transparency Color Key Value in 36-bit RGB format

register.description: The register sets the min transparency color value for the overlays. Shadow register.

bitfield.description: [35:32] Transparency Color Key Value in 36-bit RGB format
